title: Player tracking MVP (trust-first)
summary: Detect and track all players with conservative identity continuity (breaks preferred over swaps).
Assign players to teams using bib colors with temporal smoothing and an Unknown state.
non_goals: Jersey-number OCR or advanced re-identification beyond conservative continuity.
Forcing team assignment when evidence is weak (Unknown is acceptable and preferred).
success_criteria: Per-frame player detections are produced with confidence and diagnostics (trust-first).
MOT prefers breaks over swaps and emits track confidence + explicit break reasons.
Team assignment outputs A/B/Unknown with smoothing and diagnostics; contract is updated.

quality_areas.title: Functional objectives
objectives: Per-frame player detections are produced with confidence and diagnostics.
Team assignment outputs A/B/Unknown with smoothing and diagnostics.

quality_areas.title: Non-functional objectives
objectives: Tracking is trust-first: breaks are preferred over identity swaps (correctness/safety).
Diagnostics and schemas are stable and suitable for audits and downstream tooling.

work_packages.title: Detection + tracking
items: TASK-PLAYER-DET-001 Per-frame player detections (bbox/pos, confidence, diagnostics) + contract update.
TASK-PLAYER-MOT-001 Swap-avoidant MOT with breaks, confidence, and break reasons + contract update.

work_packages.title: Team assignment
items: TASK-TEAM-001 Bib-color team assignment A/B/Unknown with smoothing + diagnostics + contract update.
